sect1.title: Build Flags
sect1.para: We will need to setup target specific flags for the compiler and linkers.

screen.userinput: export BUILD32="-mabi=32" export BUILDN32="-mabi=n32" export BUILD64="-mabi=64"

sect1.para: You will need to set your host target triplet for o32 bit:
To prevent errors when you come back to your build, we will export these variables to prevent any build issues in the future:

screen.userinput: echo export BUILD32=\""${BUILD32}\"" >> ~/.bash_profile echo export BUILDN32=\""${BUILDN32}\"" >> ~/.bash_profile echo export BUILD64=\""${BUILD64}\"" >> ~/.bash_profile echo export LFS_TARGET32=\""${LFS_TARGET32}\"" >> ~/.bash_profile
